summary: New follower for skyrim, with her own house.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-pnnvYrYFGJM/VSq7QAzmnFI/AAAAAAAAAf0/50bJyZLAcvg/w1043-h365-no/NyriahBanner.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=3]Hi!
Introducing my first follower mod; Nyriah Athedain (Neeraiah) the Dark Huntress, she is a friendly follower, with a special blue eyes; she have her own house and is fully with all furniture you need for smithing, enchanting or make potions, located in the south road of Dawnstar.[/size][/font]

[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-BPklfGSZhrM/VSq7lCC5A_I/AAAAAAAAAgc/Q5HTG55cV0M/w1035-h583-no/TESV%2B2015-04-12%2B13-22-55-27.jpg[/img]


Please have fun, and if you like him, may be you can marriage with him :D 
See'ya!
Eredirn
----------------requeriments-----------------
 - Skyrim 1.8 [minimum]
 - Dawnguard
-----------------installation----------------
Extract the Data folder in your Skyrim directory
"C://Program files/The Elder Scroll V Skyrim/"
------------------Recomend-------------------
 - Demon Hunter Armor by Jojjo.
 - Daedric Crossbow.
 - UNP.
 - SG Renewal.
 - Pretty Face.
 - SKSE.
------------------Credits--------------------
 - Skyrim - Glowing Eyes v3 by dumle35
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21232/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21232/[/url]?
 - UNP by dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/[/url]?
---------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------
-----------------change log------------------
 - 2.1 add new house and glowing eyes (dawnguard required)
 - 2.2 fix house crafting place, change face and hair.
author: Eredirn
